channel.description: Alright, I'm using a 317 Nonstop PK base, and I was wondering if anyone could help me with making a handler. I added a complete working Castle Wars, and instead of having it clog up my client.java, I want to put it in a CastleWarsHandler.java, any help please? :D

item.dc:creator: @Sideways_8 Sideways_8
item.description:
@Sideways_8 wrote:

Awesome, thank you so much It’s not so much for lag as it would just be easier to modify with it all compacted in one .java But thanks I’d rep if i could. Some nab de-repped me for
helping him… lol

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @madgamer madgamer
item.description:
@madgamer wrote:

Probably be easier to just leave it in the client file since handler’s don’t really do much to help against lag and what not. But if you still wanted to you’d have to add a new class and put all the code inside of it like so.

[code]public class CastleWarsHandler {

public static void stairs(int x, int y, int i) {
client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[i];
/* code here, all lines preceded by ‘c.’ */
}

}[/code]

Read full topic
